name: Potato Crackers
description: POTATO CRACKERS is the leading and most popular snack prepared with combination of wheat and potato. It is a light, crispy snack

name: MR TWIST
description: Mr. TWIST is especially attractive to the youngsters for its unique shape and taste. It is a potato based premium snack with a beautiful twisty shape

name: ALOOZ
description: Alooz Chips Magic Masala is a combination of potatoes and spices. A new range of mouthwatering flavors brings change to your tastebud.

name: RING CHIPS
description: RING CHIPS is the first ever crisp introduced in Bangladesh by Bombay Sweets in 1986. Decades later, it is still a favorite. This ring shaped spicy snack will surely satisfy your taste buds.

name: BOMBAY SWEETS CHANACHUR
description: Chanachur is a delicious food eaten as an evening meal in Bangladesh. People of all classes love Chanachur a lot. Bombay Sweets Chanachur 600 gm brings high-quality Chanachur with premium taste

name: DALMOOTH
description: Bombay Sweets Dalmoth is a delicious tasty savory mix contains nutritional green lentils. Potato crisps and special spices have also been added to create this premium mix.

name: JHALMURI
description: Potato crisps and special spices have also been added to create this premium mix.It’s a popular spicy ethnic snack of Bangladesh mixed with fried Peanuts and some other ingredients of Chanachur.

name: NACHOZ
description: Always a great snacking experience with a different taste of a perfect Triangular Tortilla chips named “Nachos” made from Corn, Potato and Rice. Tastes like an authentic restaurant chips, Nachoz is available in two attractive flavors- Spicy Nacho cheese, Chulney & Lime

name: MR PASTA
description: Try out the yumminess of this innovative instant pasta blended blissfully with spicy flavours. It can be easily prepared in 3 minutes. You simply cannot resist the mouth watering Chili Chicken or Tangy Tomato with a twist. Delight yourself with this healthy and delicious instant pasta today at home, office or outdoors!

name: BBQ CHANACHUR
description: The barbeque flavored chanachur is another new addition to Bombay Sweets famous Namkeen line. It has a nice smokey flavor which is unique and trendy.
